_header: Take worms that been together gone

HunHM64.First Lines:
Take wormys that ben to gedere gonWithe all the erthe there
                    vppon…
HunHM64.Last Lines:
…And have goode hope in godde almyghtAnd he schall have helpe
                    I plight
HunHM64.Note:
Written as prose, with red highlights for initials of each line; first
                    heading is ‘ffor to don flesshe Roten’ (f.
                    114vb).
HunHM64.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 244-6 (excerpts).
